articles.title: I'm a cellphone repair expert - here's the big charging mistake everyone makes - Daily Mail
articles.description: The way many of us recharge our phones - including leaving it on charge overnight or plugged in while we work - can actually damage the battery, permanently diminishing the battery.
articles.content:
Most of us have been charging our phones wrong, according to a phone repair expert who specializes in refurbishing old handsets.

articles.title: Scientists followed ER patients for a year after they survived near-death experiences - Daily Mail
articles.description: Researchers evaluated ICU patients in Belgium and found that 15 percent of them had a near-death experience. After one year, the events had no significant impact on their outlook on life.
articles.content:
We're often told that a near-death experience is a life-changing event that transforms sufferers' outlook on life.
